text: FromSoftware, Inc. is a Japanese video game developer that made video games like the Souls series, Elden Ring, Bloodborne, and Sekiro. Games that the company made before the Souls series include the King's Field series and the Armored Core series. The company has been lead by Hidetaka Miyazaki, the leader of the Demon's Souls team, since Demon's Souls became popular. == Other websites == * Category:1986 establishments in Japan Category:Tokyo Category:Video game companies of Japan
title: FromSoftware
